title: test_basic_aggregate: json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Extra data: line 1 column 166 (char 165)

milestone.title: Release 0.10.0
milestone.description:
The release with new metadata aggregation/search support.

Should include 0.9.2 fixes etc, i.e. have 0.9.x branch merged

body:
#### What is the problem?
Happened (or may be regularly) in that heavy debug mode matrix run (only):
https://travis-ci.org/datalad/datalad/jobs/353137426

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.metadata.tests.test_aggregation.test_basic_aggregate
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):

    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/travis/build/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 494, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
  File "/home/travis/build/datalad/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 905, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)

    return func(*args, **kwargs)

    args, kwargs)
  File "/home/travis/build/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 458, in return_func

    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "/home/travis/build/datalad/datalad/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 482, in _process_results

    save=False, result_renderer=None, return_type=list)

json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Extra data: line 1 column 166 (char 165)
```
